about_the_game:
About BYTE

BYTE is a tactics RPG that adapts the classic novel Dracula, by Bram Stoker, with an emphasis on the themes of queerness and technology.

You play as Jonathan Harker, Dracula’s real estate agent, completing work tasks while exploring the castle, speaking with its inhabitants, and hacking into computers.

The Write Your Vows In Blood! Demo

This demo of BYTE takes you through Jonathan’s first month in the castle. Begin working, learn the thrills and terrors of the real estate world, and help the Count prepare for a wedding he plans on hosting at the castle at the end of the month.

content_descriptors.notes:
Mild sexual and suggestive themes throughout the game.

General themes of death, fear, and horror present throughout.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer (64-bit)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
